title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the contents of the db field correctly. It fails to render the content based on its type.
EB: The dynamic text element should properly display the contents of the db field based on its type. HTML text within <html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags should all be rendered correctly.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a db field with three types of content: 
   a) HTML text within <html> tags
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text element does not render the content correctly.
